name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Business Documentation Connector - for D365FO and ADO

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Valuable documentation is documentation that users can find. Gain direct access from D365FO to business documentation created in ADO

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best documentation is the documentation the users can find.

This powerful and free tool makes your business documentation in ADO (Azure DevOps) better than ever. When implementing D365FO ADO is mandatory. Created business documentation in ADO together with your implementation partner, and enable your users to find this valuable work. Business documentation can be of paramters, configuration and  business processes.
This tool connects your documentation in ADO directly to D365FO.

Just make sure to include the menu item in a dedicated field in your ADO documentation and this tool will make creation of documentation and usage of documentation by users straight forward.

You only need to link your ADO and D365FO - and insert in what ADO field you have the D365FO menu item - then you are good to go.
